languages.text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
During ground or space combat, you can use {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight an icon on the abilities panel and {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>

Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

languages.text:
Каждый участник группы с помощью сочетания {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} может подсвечивать следующие объекты:
-<indent=5%>существо (в бою или вне боя)</indent>
-<indent=5%>клетку на поле боя (наземного или космического)</indent>
-<indent=5%>объект на карте (карте локации, системы или Простора Коронус)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Каждый участник группы с помощью сочетания {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} может подсвечивать следующие объекты:
-<indent=5%>существо (в бою или вне боя)</indent>
-<indent=5%>клетку на поле боя (наземного или космического)</indent>
-<indent=5%>объект на карте (карте локации, системы или Простора Коронус)</indent>

Каждый участник группы с помощью сочетания {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} может подсвечивать следующие объекты:
-<indent=5%>существо (в бою или вне боя)</indent>
-<indent=5%>клетку на поле боя (наземного или космического)</indent>
-<indent=5%>объект на карте (карте локации, системы или Простора Коронус)</indent>

languages.text:
Todos los miembros del grupo pueden usar {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} para resaltar un elemento, como:
-<indent=5%>una unidad (dentro y fuera del combate)</indent>
-<indent=5%>una casilla del campo de batalla (en combate terrestre y espacial)</indent>
-<indent=5%>un elemento en el mapa (incluyendo el mapa de ubicación, el de sistema y el de la Extensión de Koronus)</indent>
languages.original_text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Todos los miembros del grupo pueden usar {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} para resaltar un elemento, como:
-<indent=5%>una unidad (dentro y fuera del combate)</indent>
-<indent=5%>una casilla del campo de batalla (en combate terrestre y espacial)</indent>
-<indent=5%>un elemento en el mapa (incluyendo el mapa de ubicación, el de sistema y el de la Extensión de Koronus)</indent>

languages.text:
各グループメンバーは、{console_bind|Confirm}+{console_bind|LeftUp}で次のような選択中のオブジェクトをハイライトできる：
-<indent=5%>ユニット（出撃中かどうかに関わらず）</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦場のマス（地上と宇宙空間）</indent>
-<indent=5%>マップ上のオブジェクト（ロケーションマップ、システムマップ、コロヌス・エクスパンスのマップを含む）</indent>
languages.original_text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
各グループメンバーは、{console_bind|Confirm}+{console_bind|LeftUp}で次のような選択中のオブジェクトをハイライトできます：
-<indent=5%>ユニット（出撃中かどうかに関わらず）</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦場のマス（地上と宇宙空間）</indent>
-<indent=5%>マップ上のオブジェクト（ロケーションマップ、システムマップ、コロヌス・エクスパンスのマップを含む）</indent>

languages.text:
每位队员都可以通过{console_bind|Confirm}+{console_bind|LeftUp}来高亮标记选中的物品，包括：
- <indent=5%>某个特定单位（战斗与非战斗状态均可）</indent>
- <indent=5%>战场上某个特定格子（地面战斗与太空战斗）</indent>
- <indent=5%>地图上某个特定对象（包括地区地图、系统地图，以及科罗努斯扩区地图）</indent>
languages.original_text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
每位队员都可以通过{console_bind|Confirm}+{console_bind|LeftUp}来高亮标记选中的物品，包括：
- <indent=5%>某个特定单位（战斗与非战斗状态均可）</indent>
- <indent=5%>战场上某个特定格子（地面战斗与太空战斗）</indent>
- <indent=5%>地图上某个特定对象（包括地区地图、系统地图，以及科罗努斯扩区地图）</indent>

languages.text:
Jedes Gruppenmitglied kann mit {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} unter anderem folgende Objekte markieren:
-<indent=5%>eine Einheit (im Kampf oder außerhalb des Kampfes)</indent>
-<indent=5%>eine Zelle auf dem Schlachtfeld (Boden- und Raumkämpfe)</indent>
-<indent=5%>ein Objekt auf der Karte (Ortskarte, Systemkarte und Karte der Koronus-Ausdehnung)</indent>
languages.original_text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

-<indent=5%>eine Einheit (im Kampf oder außerhalb des Kampfes)</indent>

-<indent=5%>ein Objekt auf der Karte (Ortskarte, Systemkarte und Karte der Koronus-Ausdehnung)</indent>

languages.text:
Chaque membre du groupe peut utiliser {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} pour mettre en évidence un objet sélectionné, tel que :
-<indent=5%>une unité (en combat et hors combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>une case du champ de bataille (en combat au sol ou dans l'espace)</indent>
-<indent=5%>un objet sur la carte (carte du secteur, carte du système et carte des Étendues de Koronus comprises)</indent>
languages.original_text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Chaque membre du groupe peut utiliser {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} pour mettre en évidence un objet sélectionné, tel que :
-<indent=5%>une unité (en combat et hors combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>une case du champ de bataille (en combat au sol ou dans l'espace)</indent>
-<indent=5%>un objet sur la carte (carte du secteur, carte du système et carte des Étendues de Koronus comprises)</indent>

Chaque membre du groupe peut utiliser {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} pour mettre en évidence un objet sélectionné, tel que :
-<indent=5%>une unité (en combat et hors combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>une case du champ de bataille (en combat au sol ou dans l'espace)</indent>
-<indent=5%>un objet sur la carte (carte du secteur, carte du système et carte des Étendues de Koronus comprises)</indent>

languages.text:
Grup üyelerinden her biri, {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} ile seçtiği şu nesneleri aydınlatıp vurgulayabilir:
-<indent=5%>bir birim (çatışma sırasında veya dışında)</indent>
-<indent=5%>çatışma alanındaki bir hücre (kara ve uzay çatışmasında)</indent>
-<indent=5%>haritadaki bir nesne (konum haritası, sistem haritası ve Koronus Enginliği haritası)</indent>
languages.original_text:
Each group member can use {console_bind|Confirm} + {console_bind|LeftUp} to highlight a selected object, such as:
-<indent=5%>a unit (in combat and out of combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield (in ground and space combat)</indent>
-<indent=5%>an object on the map (including location map, system map, and the Koronus Expanse map)</indent>
